channel.title: Stung Drums Challenge
channel.description:
_Ahhhhh! There’s a swarm of bees! They are stinging your drums! What are you gonna do? You need to make a song quick, but all of your drums are too lumpy of bee stings to drum. (And it would hurt them if you tried!)_
For this challenge you need to make a song of any length, without drums.
RULES AND GUIDELINES: - You can not use drums for anything. - You can not manipulate sounds to work as drums (for example, automating Punch to sound like a kick). - You can submit with a soundcloud link OR a project link (either works, but I would suggest soundcloud to prevent plagiarism). - The song can be any length, but it should still consist of all song parts. - Submissions end on the 23rd of November. - PM me if you have questions, or would like an extra day or 2 on the challenge. - Most likes wins. But if likes are scarce then I will manually choose. - Winner will be announced on the 30th of November.
Remember to have fun!
**GO!**

item.title: Stung Drums Challenge
item.dc:creator: Polar
item.description:
Ahhhhh! There’s a swarm of bees! They are stinging your drums! What are you gonna do? You need to make a song quick, but all of your drums are too lumpy of bee stings to drum. (And it would hurt them if you tried!)

For this challenge you need to make a song of any length, without drums.

RULES AND GUIDELINES:

  • You can not use drums for anything.
  • You can not manipulate sounds to work as drums (for example, automating Punch to sound like a kick).
  • You can submit with a soundcloud link OR a project link (either works, but I would suggest soundcloud to prevent plagiarism).
  • The song can be any length, but it should still consist of all song parts.
  • Submissions end on the 23rd of November.
  • PM me if you have questions, or would like an extra day or 2 on the challenge.
  • Most likes wins. But if likes are scarce then I will manually choose.
  • Winner will be announced on the 30th of November.

Remember to have fun!

GO!
